host.title: Host
host.description: The hostname or IP address of your UniFi Controller. Include the port if required (e.g. '192.168.1.1:8443').

username.title: Username
username.description: Username used to log into your UniFi Controller.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the above UniFi account.

sites.title: Sites
sites.description: Optional list of UniFi site names to control (e.g. ['default', 'MyHome']). Leave empty to use the ‘default’ site.

includeIds.title: Include Device IDs
includeIds.description: Optional list of specific device IDs to include. Leave empty to include all devices, unless excluded below.

excludeIds.title: Exclude Device IDs
excludeIds.description: Optional list of device IDs to exclude. Devices listed here will be ignored, even if also listed above.

refreshIntervalMinutes.title: Device Cache Refresh Interval (minutes)
refreshIntervalMinutes.description: How often to refresh the device cache, in minutes. Default is 10.
